page.title: 01General Review of this Area
page.content: Basically a farming area with a few small local businesses,schooling and shopping facilities, with a population of approx.1500. A small new housing development, recreational facilities, churches and public houses.Information included within:Primary schooling:the building,staff & curriculum.Shopping facilities:static & mobile. Places of worship: buildings,festivals and clubs. Public houses:building and facilities. Farming:crops,livestock,machinery and public footpaths.Wildlife within the area.Agricultural Institute:history, accomodation,courses & facilities.Pages from children's Diaries. Clubs & Sport for all ages. Extracts from Monthly Parish Newsletter. Children's Games and Pastimes, The Area in General; A Comparison.Local Employment & Business. Credits.
